courseDescription:
There are multiple types of processes that manufacturers can use in the manufacturing of a product such as the casting process. Manufacturing Processes - Casting Processes is a free online course that will teach you about the casting process, what it is used for and the important steps of the casting process. This course will teach you about how to maintain castings as well as it's defects and how to prevent them.

This course begins by introducing you to the casting process and what it is used for. You will learn about the material properties that matters for successful casting as well as the important steps of the casting process. Furthermore, you will learn about the factors that affect the properties of the moulding sand and the Gating System. Lastly, you will learn about the casting defects and their prevention, shell mould casting as well as investment/permanent mould casting.

This free online course will give you an in-depth understanding of the different casting processes involved in the manufacturing of goods. You will learn the importance of achieving the desired size, shape, and properties of a product. This course will be of great interest to individuals in the automotive industry and the cement industry. Start this free course today and improve your knowledge of casting processes.
